alert.note: Alert for Curry County Coast; South Central Oregon Coast (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Frost Advisory issued November 09 at 1:09PM PST until November 10 at 9:00AM PST by NWS Medford
info.description: ...FROST ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 9 AM PST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Temperatures as low as 32 degrees will result in frost formation. * WHERE...The coastlines of Coos, Curry, and Douglas counties, including Bandon, North Bend, Reedsport, Lakeside, and the outskirts of Brookings. * WHEN...From 1 AM to 9 AM PST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Frost could kill sensitive outdoor vegetation if left uncovered. * View the hazard area in detail at https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/map/?wfo=mfr
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold.

area.areaDesc: Curry County Coast; South Central Oregon Coast
